title_advert: ['Great Location | 5 Bedroom Townhouse | Sur Lamer']
descriptions:
["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's International Realty is pleased to offer you this beautiful project in La Mer, Sur La Mer.
Sur La Mer is located adjacent to Port De La Mer, a ground-breaking master community located at the tip of the peninsula.
Residents have access to unparalleled shopping, dining and hospitality experiences, along with leisure, entertainment and convenience options.
Sur La Mer Townhouses by Meraas situated within the Port De La Mer in the heart of Jumeirah 1. First Freehold waterfront community in Jumeirah. The most accentuating feature of a good location is the connectivity it offers. Port De La Mer can be reached by both roadway and waterway. Dwellers can commute from malls to amusement parks to airports in a flash. Sur la Mer Townhouses at Port De La Mer are within 10-15 minutes radius of most popular properties in the city, out of which a few of them are by Meraas.
-190+ Berth Marina
-Landscaped Terraces
-World Class Yacht Club
-Private Beach Access
-Outdoor park with kids play areas and private landscaped terraces
-The First Freehold Master Community in Jumeirah
-5 minutes to La Mer
-10 minutes to City Walk
-15 minutes to Dubai Intl. Airport
-45 minutes to Al Maktoum Airport
Port De La Mer can be reached by road and sea, meaning residents can take in the spectacular coastline at their leisure, be at one of the city’s famous shopping malls in minutes or be boarding a flight to more than 240 destinations in next to no time.
Contact Gulf Sotheby's International Realty for a complete project overview of this extraordinary property."]

title_advert: ['Exclusive Burj Al Arab facing MV plot']
descriptions:
["DescriptionLocated north of Dubai's beachfront shoreline  of Jumeirah, the  exclusive  Jumeirah  Bay  island houses  127 villa plots, and is home to the first Bulgari Resort and Residences in the Middle East. This purpose-built island, developed by Meraas, will be home to Dubai's most discerning residents, with the luxury of uninterrupted views to the Arabian Gulf and direct beach access. Residents  on  the Jumeirah Bay island  enjoy their own private beach and a high end lifestyle. Spread over 6.3 million square feet, the Jumeirah Bay island has direct access to Jumeirah Beach  Road  via a 300m distinctive private  bridge, next to The Four Seasons Hotel. 
This  plot offers the choicest of views towards  the skyline  of Dubai  as well  as spectacular views of the Burj Khalifa. Most Dubai destinations including the Airport, Dubai Mall, Burj Khalifa  are within 20 mins drive
This pristine site is one of the most sought after locations in Dubai and could be yours.
For private viewings, please call."]

title_advert: ['Fully Vastu Compliance Residential Plot']
descriptions:
["DescriptionGulf Sotheby's International Realty is pleased to offer you the opportunity to create, design and build your very own prestigious villa located on what will be Dubai's most exclusive address. With a 23,300 square foot plot that is located on the beach, here is your chance to be living among the community located on Jumeirah Bay which is a man-made marvel, with six million square foot mixed-use island, developed by Meraas. This plot is ideal, as it is faces the Burj Al Arab offering a beautiful aspect of light, sunshine and prime location within the island. 
There is already a fully executed detailed architectural plan and construction team in place to build this magnificent home. All contracts are with top quality architects and construction teams. This can be discussed and negotiated into the price, at a higher value for the design work already completed. It is a one of a kind design allowing the new land owner a turn key solution and bespoke home. 
The island located off the coast of Jumeirah Beach Road and between the Fours Seasons Hotel and Mandarin Oriental Residences. The island features also newly finished Bvlgari Development which includes a boutique hotel and residences complex. This is an incredible opportunity to be living in an exclusive enclave of discerning homeowners. 
Private viewings can be arranged by appointment.
Contact Gulf Sotheby's International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property."]

['DescriptionParamount Tower Hotel & Residences Dubai is a luxury hotel and residential tower on Sheikh Zayed Road. The project will offer a sky lobby with views across the Burj area, a private Paramount Pictures screening room, a rooftop infinity swimming pool with terrace and fitness and wellness centre, in addition to a state-of-the-art spa.
The hotel
Floors 15 to 25 present a selection of beautiful hotel rooms which not only offer an incredible experience for guests but also provide the opportunity for a very lucrative investment too.*
Rooms are tailored for comfort and but also to inspire creativity. They feature a spectacular in-room home theatre and access to a library of Paramount films. When the credits roll, the signature bed is the grand finale to your day.
The residences
For those seeking a little more room, with separate living and dining areas as well as numerous bedrooms, floors 26 to 63 offer a collection of luxury residences. Combining the comforts of home with the Paramount amenities and service, if you wish to take that option, they are great investments that are easily let out if youre away.
Whatever your choice of property, whilst in residence, you can experience the height of fashionable living; and when youre away, youll earn impressive rental income.*
NO COMMISSION I PAYMENT PLAN OPTION I BEST LOCATION I SUPER HIGH FINISHES 
CALL NOW +971527977272']

descriptions: ['DescriptionThis plot has full sea and Dubai Skyline view, private beach and is handed over, ready to build.\nSituated off the coast of Jumeirah and behind the new Four Season’s hotel, Jumeirah Bay Island is set to become the most sought after address in Dubai with luxurious residences and breath-taking sea views. The seahorse-shaped island development by Meraas  features an array of residential buildings and villas  accompanied by green  spaces and stunning  panoramic views of the sea and the Dubai skyline. With the iconic Bulgari Resort & Residences complete which includes a 5-star hotel, residential villas and  apartments, a yacht club, a marina, and an array of leisure facilities, Jumeirah Bay is a luxurious destination. The 17,459 sq foot plot  for sale is  one of 128 beachfront plots on the island and enjoys a prime  location with private beach access  and stunning ocean and skyline views. Residents and visitors have access to the island through a bridge off  the vibrant Jumeirah Beach Road.']
